sentences.sContent: When I came to have feelings just like those foreigners, I realized that on the inside, it felt more like animosity.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I came to have feelings just like those foreigners, I realized that on the inside, it felt more like animosity.
sentences.sCn: 当我也有了其他外国人那样的感受时，我意识到在自己内心，我的感受更像是憎恶。

remMethod.val: anim(生命) + osity → 用整个生命去恨 → 憎恶， 仇恨

words.tran: 敌意；意图；基本态度；女性的男性意向
